TextView.android:text: All new students are required to attend the Handog Ni BulSU Kay Bunso. It is a yearly student orientation intended for new (freshmen and transfer) students of the University. Student orientation programs are designed to initiate the integration of newly admitted first-year and transfer undergraduate students into the academic, cultural, and social climate of the University. At the Student Orientation, you will meet with different people in the academe. It also provides a chance to meet other incoming BSU students. The program is designed to prepare freshmen for the academic rigor at BulSU, introduce them to the rigors and joys of schooling traditions and acquaint them with our campus resources. The program is an opportunity for the new students to discover the different academic facilities of the BSU community. During the program they will begin to build a network of resources that will help them to start their BSU journey on the right path. \n\nThe Old students are also given an annual Re-orientation because it is expected that some of the rules and regulations are forgotten as the students stay in the university
